Key Match Events: Jeffrey Vandersay took six wickets in the match
Charith Asalanka dismissed Mohammed Siraj, Washington Sundar, Axar Patel, KL Rahul, Shreyas Iyer, Virat Kohli, Shivam Dube, and Shubman Gill
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka managed to defend the 231-run target in a dominated era
Dunith Wellalage, who scored 67 runs, will look to provide a similar output
Rohit Sharma looks to break multiple batting records during the 2nd ODI
Wanindu Hasaranga is ruled out of the remainder of the series due to a hamstring injury
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's victory is a massive confidence booster for the island nation
India will need to improve their batting in the third ODI if they are to level the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jeffrey Vandersay turned the game for Sri Lanka with his impressive bowling
Charith Asalanka's wickets were crucial in sealing the victory for Sri Lanka
